title: Myanmar judge refuses to drop case against reporters
text:
Myanmar judge refuses to drop case against reporters 11:15am BST - 01:19 
A Myanmar judge rejects a request for dismissal of case against two jailed Reuters reporters. The two were jailed after being accused of possessing secret government papers. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A Myanmar judge rejects a request for dismissal of case against two jailed Reuters reporters. The two were jailed after being accused of possessing secret government papers.
